benchmark_details.name: MineBench
benchmark_details.overview: MineBench is a benchmark tailored for multimodal mineral exploration tasks, aiming to evaluate MLLMs in reasoning over domain-specific remote-sensing data.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To evaluate MLLMs in mineral exploration using geological and hyperspectral data.

data.annotation: Human-annotated classes based on geological features.

methodology.calculation: Metrics are calculated based on model outputs compared to human-annotated classifications and ground truth labels.
methodology.interpretation: Scores close to 1 indicate high confidence in mineralization presence, while lower scores indicate uncertainty.
methodology.baseline_results: Pos.F1 of 34.93% for Random Choice model without MineAgent, with improvements up to 61.20% with MineAgent.
methodology.validation: Rigorous review by geoscience experts ensured data quality and classification reliability.
